items.question: Why was [Event] organized?
items.sparql:
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX oa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/oa#>
PREFIX dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
SELECT ?eventName ?eventDescription
WHERE {
    BIND ({event} AS ?event)
    ?annotation a oa:Annotation ;
           dct:subject ex:Background ;
           oa:hasTarget ?event ;
           oa:hasBody ?background .
    ?background schema:description ?eventDescription .
    ?event schema:name ?eventName .
}

rows.eventDescription: Live Aid was a dual-venue global benefit concert held on 13 July 1985, inspired by the Band Aid charity single “Do They Know It’s Christmas?” to raise funds for famine relief in Ethiopia. Conceived by Bob Geldof and Midge Ure, it was broadcast to nearly 2 billion viewers worldwide and became a landmark in humanitarian fundraising and popular culture.

rows_n3.eventDescription: "Live Aid was a dual-venue global benefit concert held on 13 July 1985, inspired by the Band Aid charity single “Do They Know It’s Christmas?” to raise funds for famine relief in Ethiopia. Conceived by Bob Geldof and Midge Ure, it was broadcast to nearly 2 billion viewers worldwide and became a landmark in humanitarian fundraising and popular culture."

items.executed_query:
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX oa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/oa#>
PREFIX dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
SELECT ?eventName ?eventDescription
WHERE {
    BIND (ex:LiveAid1985 AS ?event)
    ?annotation a oa:Annotation ;
           dct:subject ex:Background ;
           oa:hasTarget ?event ;
           oa:hasBody ?background .
    ?background schema:description ?eventDescription .
    ?event schema:name ?eventName .
}
LIMIT 5

items.question: What kind of event was [Event]
items.sparql:
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX oa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/oa#>
PREFIX dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
SELECT ?eventName ?eventDescription
WHERE {
    BIND ({event} AS ?event)
    ?annotation a oa:Annotation ;
           dct:subject ex:Background ;
           oa:hasTarget ?event ;
           oa:hasBody ?background .
    ?background schema:description ?eventDescription .
    ?event schema:name ?eventName .
}

items.executed_query:
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX oa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/oa#>
PREFIX dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
SELECT ?eventName ?eventDescription
WHERE {
    BIND (ex:LiveAid1985 AS ?event)
    ?annotation a oa:Annotation ;
           dct:subject ex:Background ;
           oa:hasTarget ?event ;
           oa:hasBody ?background .
    ?background schema:description ?eventDescription .
    ?event schema:name ?eventName .
}
LIMIT 5

items.question: How many satellites were used during [Event]’s broadcast?
items.sparql:
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
SELECT ?eventName ?satelliteNetworkDescription (SUM(?count) AS ?totalSatellites)
WHERE {
    BIND(  {event} AS ?event)
    ?event schema:name ?eventName .
    ?broadcast a schema:BroadcastEvent ;
               schema:superEvent ?event ;
               ex:facilitatedBy ?satelliteNetwork .
    ?satelliteNetwork schema:hasPart ?fleet .
    ?satelliteNetwork schema:description ?satelliteNetworkDescription .
    ?fleet schema:numberOfItems ?count .
}
GROUP BY ?eventName ?broadcast ?satelliteNetworkDescription

rows.satelliteNetworkDescription: A network of commercial telecommunications satellites including five Intelsat satellites, which were integral to the global broadcast of the 1985 Live Aid concert.

rows_n3.satelliteNetworkDescription: "A network of commercial telecommunications satellites including five Intelsat satellites, which were integral to the global broadcast of the 1985 Live Aid concert."

items.executed_query:
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
SELECT ?eventName ?satelliteNetworkDescription (SUM(?count) AS ?totalSatellites)
WHERE {
    BIND(  ex:LiveAid1985 AS ?event)
    ?event schema:name ?eventName .
    ?broadcast a schema:BroadcastEvent ;
               schema:superEvent ?event ;
               ex:facilitatedBy ?satelliteNetwork .
    ?satelliteNetwork schema:hasPart ?fleet .
    ?satelliteNetwork schema:description ?satelliteNetworkDescription .
    ?fleet schema:numberOfItems ?count .
}
GROUP BY ?eventName ?broadcast ?satelliteNetworkDescription
LIMIT 5

items.question: What was the attendance at each venue of [Event]?
Who founded [Event]?
items.sparql:
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
SELECT ?eventName ?founderName
WHERE {
    BIND(  {event} AS ?event)
    ?event schema:name ?eventName .
    ?event schema:organizer ?founder .
    ?founder schema:name ?founderName .
}
items.executed_query:

PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
SELECT ?eventName ?founderName
WHERE {
    BIND(  ex:LiveAid1985 AS ?event)
    ?event schema:name ?eventName .
    ?event schema:organizer ?founder .
    ?founder schema:name ?founderName .
}
LIMIT 5

items.question: Which [Artist] performed during [Event]?

rows.allPerformingArtists: Adam Ant, Ashford & Simpson, Billy Ocean, Black Sabbath, Bob Dylan, Bryan Adams, Bryan Ferry, Crosby, Stills, Nash & Young, Crosby, Stills & Nash, Daryl Hall & John Oates, David Bowie, Dire Straits, Duran Duran, Elton John, Elvis Costello, Eric Clapton, Four Tops, Freddie Mercury, Howard Jones, Joan Baez, Judas Priest, Kenny Loggins, Madonna, Mick Jagger, Neil Young, Nik Kershaw, Patti LaBelle, Paul McCartney, Paul Young, Phil Collins, Pretenders, REO Speedwagon, Rick Springfield, Run‐D.M.C., Sade, Santana, Simple Minds, Spandau Ballet, Status Quo, Sting, The Beach Boys, The Boomtown Rats, The Cars, The Hooters, The Power Station, The Style Council, The Who, Thompson Twins, Tina Turner, U2, Ultravox, Queen

rows_n3.allPerformingArtists: "Adam Ant, Ashford & Simpson, Billy Ocean, Black Sabbath, Bob Dylan, Bryan Adams, Bryan Ferry, Crosby, Stills, Nash & Young, Crosby, Stills & Nash, Daryl Hall & John Oates, David Bowie, Dire Straits, Duran Duran, Elton John, Elvis Costello, Eric Clapton, Four Tops, Freddie Mercury, Howard Jones, Joan Baez, Judas Priest, Kenny Loggins, Madonna, Mick Jagger, Neil Young, Nik Kershaw, Patti LaBelle, Paul McCartney, Paul Young, Phil Collins, Pretenders, REO Speedwagon, Rick Springfield, Run‐D.M.C., Sade, Santana, Simple Minds, Spandau Ballet, Status Quo, Sting, The Beach Boys, The Boomtown Rats, The Cars, The Hooters, The Power Station, The Style Council, The Who, Thompson Twins, Tina Turner, U2, Ultravox, Queen"

items.executed_query:
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX mm: <https://w3id.org/polifonia/ontology/music-meta/>
SELECT DISTINCT ?eventName (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?artistName; separator=", ") AS ?allPerformingArtists)
WHERE {
    ?performance a schema:Event, mm:LivePerformance ;
           schema:isPartOf ?event ;
           schema:performer ?artist .
    ?event schema:name ?eventName .
    ?artist schema:name ?artistName .
    FILTER(?event =   ex:LiveAid1985)
}
GROUP BY ?eventName
LIMIT 5

items.question: Which [Song] did [Artist] perform at [Event]?
items.sparql:
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX mm: <https://w3id.org/polifonia/ontology/music-meta/>
SELECT (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?workName; separator=", ") AS ?allWorkName)
WHERE {
    ?performance a mm:LivePerformance ;
                 schema:isPartOf ?event ;
    			 ex:isIconic ?isIconic .
    ?performance mm:performedWork ?work .
    ?performance schema:performer ?artist .
    ?work schema:name ?workName .
    FILTER(?event =   {event})
    FILTER(?artist = {musicgroup})
}

rows.allWorkName: Bohemian Rhapsody, Crazy Little Thing Called Love, Hammer to Fall, Radio Ga Ga, We Are the Champions, We Will Rock You

rows_n3.allWorkName: "Bohemian Rhapsody, Crazy Little Thing Called Love, Hammer to Fall, Radio Ga Ga, We Are the Champions, We Will Rock You"

items.executed_query:
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX mm: <https://w3id.org/polifonia/ontology/music-meta/>
SELECT (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?workName; separator=", ") AS ?allWorkName)
WHERE {
    ?performance a mm:LivePerformance ;
                 schema:isPartOf ?event ;
    			 ex:isIconic ?isIconic .
    ?performance mm:performedWork ?work .
    ?performance schema:performer ?artist .
    ?work schema:name ?workName .
    FILTER(?event =   ex:LiveAid1985)
    FILTER(?artist = ex:Queen)
}
LIMIT 5
